column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I love this place! I've been coming here for years with positive experiences
column2: but most recently we had our wedding rehearsal dinner here and had an amazing experience. Not only was the staff team 100% professional
column3: but the customer service that we received on the day of (and leading up to) our dinner was exceptional. Everything on our menu (calamari
column8: green salad) was cooked to perfection in terms of the flavor and the temperature. I could not provide a higher recommendation if you are looking for a yummy meal or planning an event.
